pageProduct.name: VitalStrength WPI Plus 100 Whey Protein Isolate 1Kg Vanilla
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Vital Strength’s 100% WPI+ Whey Protein Isolate is one of the cleanest available sources of protein. Superior micro and ultra-filtration processes remove fat, lactose & other impurities to deliver a protein that is low in calories, easier to digest and rapidly absorbed. Low levels of lactose make this protein the first choice for those with lactose intolerance.
WPI+ further purifies standard whey to create a protein that is absorbed by the body immediately. With near zero fat and carbs & increased bioavailability this is the ultimate protein for nearly any diet.

• 37 grams of protein per serve
• Low 0.4 grams fat & carbs per serve
• 4.4 grams Leucine per serve which promotes the synthesis of muscle protein and muscle growth.
• Ultra-low 0.4 grams carbs per serve
• One of the fastest absorbing and most bio available protein sources
•  Impressively high levels BCAAs- integral to a healthy body.
• Only 0.4 grams lactose per serve - Ideal for those with dietary restrictions & sensitivities.

Warnings

This product should be used in conjunction with an appropriate physical training or exercise program. This product is not intended as a sole source of nutrition and should be consumed in conjunction with a nutritious diet and appropriate fluid intake. Not suitable for children under 15 years or pregnant women: should be used under medical or dietetic supervision. Exceeding the recommended serving size may cause harm due to the high level of vitamins and minerals.

Common Uses

Vital Strength Protein may be taken at any time of the day, mixed with water or milk or added into meals. Use in conjunction with a healthy diet to meet your protein requirements & reach your physique goals.

Ingredients

Vitalstrength Whey Isolate Blend (97%) (Instantised Cross Flow Microfiltered (MF) and Ultrafiltered (UF) Whey Protein Isolate, (contains concentrations of beta lactoglobulin, glycomacropeptide alpha lactalbumin, immunoglobulin, bovine serum albumin)), Flavours, Guar Gum, Anticaking Agent (551), Sweetener (Sucralose), Vitamins & Minerals (Calcium Carbonate, Magnesium Oxide, Ascorbic Acid (Vit C), Iron, Zinc Lactate, Vitamin E, Sodium Molybdate, Nicotinamide (Vit B3), Chromium Chloride, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Selenite, Manganese Sulfate, Folic Acid (Vit B9), Vitamin B12, Calcium Pantothenate (Vit B5), Riboflavin (Vit B2), Vitamin A, Pyridoxine HCL (Vit B6), Biotin, Thiamine (Vit B1), Vitamin D3), [Cocoa in Chocolate Blast flavour only]. Made in Australia from local and imported ingredients. Contains milk & soy products. Soy lecithin is used to instantise whey proteins and is less than 1% of the whey product. Made on equipment that also processes gluten, egg and cereals. Traces may be present.

Directions

Mix 40g (approx 2 scoops) with 250-300ml of cold milk or water. Best taken within 30 minutes of training and/or between meals. Serving size and frequency may be increased for athletes after consultation with a fitness or health care professional
